summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6240 for the improvement of North and East 95th Street from Meridian Ave. to Corliss Ave. and from 1st Ave. Northeast to 5th Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 89856, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
